name: "My Love From The Star" Full Day Tour
description:
We are going to cover Petite France, a French cultural village set in the Korean countryside, shooting place of "A Man From the Stars"
Plus we can visit Nami Island another favorite Korean drama "Winter Sonata" movie shooting place.
When we go back we can visit N-Seoul tower at night which is one of the shooting places of "A man from the stars" as well.
You will be felt like stars on those Korean TV shows in that places
